com.moomoohk.Grame.Essentials
Class GrameManager

java.lang.Object
  com.moomoohk.Grame.Essentials.GrameManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class GrameManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

The Grame Manager takes care of all the internal Grame operations.

Indexes and ticks any GrameObjects and Bases that are created automatically.

Since:
2013-04-05
Version:
1.0
Author:
Meshulam Silk

run

public void run()
Starts the Grame Manager clock.

This method should never be called by the user as doing that might create issues.

findGrameObject

public static GrameObject findGrameObject(int id)
Finds and returns a GrameObject from the Grame Objects list.
If the object is not found, null will be returned.

Parameters:
id - The ID of the object to find.
Returns:
The GrameObject with that ID. If not in the list, null will be returned.

Returns:
The Base with that ID. If not in the list, null will be returned.
